title: Pill 4766 Style Desk Clock Walnut
body: The spirit of emerging modernism is evident in this very functional and geometric work of art of George Nelson. Released in the public in 1954, the Pill Desk Clock displays Nelson’s another passion, making a surprising and innovative designs from simple materials. A Scarce beautiful modernist designer clock for your collection. Place an iconic example of mid-century modern design in your home, office or kitchen. Don’t let this last designs of George Nelson’s desk clocks slip away, own one now and be proud forever.
